document_data.mainbody:
hazlauth Yarghorn was a wizard in Waterdeep sometime after the War of the Silver Marches.
Chazlauth was a kind of dragon expert. Chazlauth lived in a house in the North Ward of Waterdeep with a silver dragon wyrmling companion, Irizzorl.
In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, he suggested to an adventuring party working to stop a giant uprising to go to speak with Old Gnawbone in Kryptgarden Forest.
